original_text: Give to everyone who asks you, and if anyone takes what belongs to you, do not demand it back.
korean_text: 네게 구하는 자에게 주며 네 것을 가져가는 자에게 다시 달라 하지 말며

sentences.original_text: Give to everyone who asks you
and if anyone takes what belongs to you
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 만약 누군가 네 것을 가져가면
